modName: Pure Mage Favorites Menu - top magic mods included
summary: This is a customization for Categorized Favorites Menu for pure mages and it includes support for the top magic mods available.
descriptionHtml:
===========================================================================
Pure Mage Favorites Menu - top magic mods included
===========================================================================


This is a customization for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url] for pure mages and it
 includes support for the top magic mods available:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3413]Midas Magic - Spells in Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5283]Be A Better Mage with Unique Spells[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5898]Phenderix Magic Evolved[/url]

I have also included:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7196]Mhenlos Custom Spells[/url]
which is not a full on mod yet like the others but I like some of his spells a lot.


===========================================================================
Installation
===========================================================================

Download CategorizedFavoritesMenu v0_1_8 from the link above
Extract in the Data/Interface folder
Overwrite with my cfg file


===========================================================================
More info
===========================================================================

I strongly recommend you use the 0.1.8.0 version of the .swf file from
 Categorized Favorites Menu because I don`t know what newer versions will 
change and my .cfg might not work with them.

Here are the versions of the magic mods this is based on:

Midas Magic - Spells in Skyrim  ---  0.07
Be A Better Mage with Unique Spells  ---  10.4
Phenderix Magic Evolved  ---  update 8
Mhenlos Custom Spells  ---  1.00

If the mod creators decide to change spell names in future updates 
of their mod those spells might show up in the other category.
I will try to update as needed.


===========================================================================
Uninstallation
===========================================================================

Delete favoritesmenu.swf and favoritesmenu.cfg from the game folder.


===========================================================================
Credits
===========================================================================

favmenumodder for making Categorized Favorites Menu.
Bethesda for creating Skyrim, and skyrimnexus for creating this forum.
author: KICKER
